nodes.text: Lettow, known as "Old Lettow", was a location mentioned in Our Empire's Army, an Imperial marching song that Zare Leonis and other Imperial cadets sang during their morning running drills.

Lettow was first canonically mentioned in the junior novel Servants of the Empire: Imperial Justice. In Legends, it was first mentioned in The New Essential Chronology, as a Core Worlds planet where the Legions of Lettow, a splinter group of Dark Jedi, were headquartered in the early days of the Galactic Republic.
